name: flaresolverr
description: FlareSolverr is a proxy server that bypasses Cloudflare protections by automating browser challenges. It is commonly used with tools like Jackett and Sonarr to access protected scraping targets in self-hosted stacks.
features: Proxy: Bypass Cloudflare protections, Automate browser challenges, API access. Unblock protected sites.
Automation: Works with Jackett, Sonarr, Radarr. Seamless integration.
Self-Hosted: Run your own proxy. Privacy-focused.
Scraping Support: Access protected targets. Essential for media stacks.
Headless Browser: Automated challenge solving. No manual intervention.
API Interface: Easy integration. RESTful endpoints.
Session Management: Handle cookies and state. Persistent access.
Multiple Instances: Scale as needed. High availability.
